nice comment in the article: 'The feature of the afternoon was a home run smash by Billy Southworth.  It came in the nineth inning.  The drive sailed over Fitzgerald's head in extreme right, and then bounded into the screen with such velocity that the ball punctured the wire network and rolled among the feet of  some spectators who were standing there.'
